From TheChels.info - The Chelsea Football Club Wiki

Jump to: navigation, search

2010-11 season 0Manager Carlo Ancelotti 0League Premier League 0Position 2nd 0FA Cup 4th Round 0League Cup 3rd Round 0Champions League Quarter Finals 0Top scorer Nicolas Anelka (16)

The 2010-11 season was Chelsea's 96th of competitive football, and the club's 22nd consecutive season in the top-flight.

Chelsea Player of the Year: Petr Cech

Players' Player of the Year: Ashley Cole

Young Player of the Year: Josh McEachran

Chelsea Goal of the Season: Ramires vs Manchester City, 20 March 2011

PFA Team of the Year: Ashley Cole

Premier League Manager of the Month: Carlo Ancelotti (August, March)

Premier League Player of the Month: David Luiz (March)

MOTD Goal of the Month: Alex vs Arsenal (October)
